comments: We should support code assist in conditional breakpoint expressions.
*** Bug 24299 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Implemented.

new classes:
  JavaBreakpointPreferencePage.BreakpointConditionFieldEditor
  BreakpointConditionCompletionProcessor

There is a issue with the code completion dialog on Linux/GTK (bug 24319)

I was unable to open the breakpoint properties dialog. I got this NPE:

oooopss

I certainly made the change (move two lines) and didn't check before commiting
the code.

Due to a 'feature' of java, method calls on the enclosing object cannot be
performed during the execution of a super constructor (the this$0 field is not 
yet initialized). I will check with jdt.core if it is really a 'feature'.

Fixed. Will be available when the CVS will be back.
